628595144.reviewBody: Crazy, these divers jump into shallow water from a very great height, awesome to watch and worth a visit.  We went to the 8pm show, cost us 75 pesos in a blue and white taxi to get there from the Emporium hotel on the Costera, and 80 pesos to return.  Pretty busy at the show, get there early for a good spot

626943699.name: Cliff divers are a "must see"
626943699.author: a TripAdvisor user
626943699.reviewBody: The cliff divers put on an excellent show and should not be missed when visiting Acapulco.\nAlthough there are many steps it is worth going to the lowest viewing platform to get the best view.

625194896.name: 2 was the charm
625194896.author: a TripAdvisor user
625194896.reviewBody: We saw this show many years ago.  We got to the Hotel Mirador to Sea a diver.  We waited an hour and after some very expensive drinks, we saw the exact same thing...a diver.\nToday we were across the road and saw 3 divers for no cost.  I believe we are now even.

622990454.name: These men are incredible!!
622990454.author: a TripAdvisor user
622990454.reviewBody: After many years, we came back to this place to enjoy the divers show. I only have to say that these men are incredible doing this without any professional protection or training, simply amazing. Tip: ask or search for the hours of the dives,  the last two are at 19.30 and 21.30 hrs, and at the end of show,  you can take photos with the divers and ask them whatever you want! Don\'t miss it at your visit to Acapulco

609526239.name: Must see!
609526239.author: a TripAdvisor user
609526239.reviewBody: This was a really neat experience! We would definitely come back with friends to watch. The view was absolutely beautiful!

608929748.name: Fun experience
608929748.author: a TripAdvisor user
608929748.reviewBody: It was nice visiting place. The cliff divers put on a very thrilling and entertaining show for us. The restaurant has lovely views.

608638852.name: Amazing!
608638852.author: a TripAdvisor user
608638852.reviewBody: La Quebrada is where the famous Cliff Divers jump and if you have not seen this, its a must see, to see them planning their dives and judging the waves and when to jump - really worth seeing!

606908651.name: Awesome cliff divers
606908651.author: a TripAdvisor user
606908651.reviewBody: A beautiful place to visit, has many photographs of artists who have visited the area. The best shows of bravery in such young men jumping from such high places. I would recommend it if you are in Acapulco. Don\'t forget to tip the cliff divers.

606716696.name: This is a must see in Acapulco
606716696.author: a TripAdvisor user
606716696.reviewBody: This is a must see in Acapulco, we went with all my family and had a great time, we highly recommend.

604610251.name: Amazing!
604610251.author: a TripAdvisor user
604610251.reviewBody: I can not find words to express how amazing this trip was! My family and I had a great time! From the moment Pepe picked us up from our hotel, he made us feel safe and at ease. He talked to us the whole way there and back about the history of this beautiful city. We had a lot of questions, but he welcomed them all. The seats that were reserved for us at La Quebrada were the best in the house..our view of the divers was awesome! We highly recommend this trip to anyone visiting Acapulco..and if you\u2019re lucky, maybe you will get Pepe as your tour guide!!

602276286.name: Interesting
602276286.author: a TripAdvisor user
602276286.reviewBody: We came to see the divers at famous La Quebrada and had a light dinner and drinks at restaurant that provides a good viewing spot. I am not a big fan of divers but it was definitely an interesting experience.

601140987.name: A dream come true
601140987.author: a TripAdvisor user
601140987.reviewBody: Wanted to see this since Elvis dived off the cliff in a movie. OK it was a stunt diver but still, it was fantastic!

599255481.name: Asombroso/ famous place to visit in Acapulco
599255481.author: a TripAdvisor user
599255481.reviewBody: This was incredibly awesome! Is 40 pesos equal to 2.50 dlls and you see a show like nothing before. Do not park around the place there is people with fake tags requesting money for the free parking then other people comes and wants money too.. try to park inside and make sure they give you some kind of recipes also there is a pharmacy store in front of it you can buy cokes and water and snacks is like oxxo.

596616908.name: WONDERFUL DIVERS
596616908.author: a TripAdvisor user
596616908.reviewBody: We took a tour around Acapulco from our cruise ship and the most memorable part of that tour was the cliff divers, who put on a show in the morning specifically for the cruise line. We had seen this performance when in Acapulco previously but it has lost none of its ability to enthrall with the spectacular performance. A must-see! We also visited various other viewing sights around Acapulco which were nice and we were fortunate to have an excellent driver/guide. Altogether a good trip.

596239833.name: A MUST See when in Acapulco, and eat at La Perle Restaurant while watching!
596239833.author: a TripAdvisor user
596239833.reviewBody: Really a great site to see these 4 young men diving about 65 feet off this beautiful cliff in Acapulco. My Tour guide Jonathan and I ate at the La Perle restaurant - where there are cool Hollywood Stars who also saw the divers years ago. I loved the fish lunch, sit, relax and wonder in the marvel of the dives. I was amazed watching them climb up the cliffs in their bare feet and hands! This is a family tradition for these men since the 1930\'s! For a small tip, get your photo with them afterward!

594727344.name: Believe the hype
594727344.author: a TripAdvisor user
594727344.reviewBody:
Took a taxi from our hotel to La Quebrada to watch the divers
 Got there a little late and had to squeeze in.
Once the divers begin to prepare one of the team hypes up the crowd and gets you focused.
The divers scale the rocks and once there time the surf to avoid being thrown against the rocks - amazing!
There is a lookout area, a nearby store and one of the classic colorful signa you find in Mexico that says ACAPULCO.

594167314.name: Acapulco de Diving
594167314.author: a TripAdvisor user
594167314.reviewBody: This is the best spectacular show no one should miss if you are in Acapulco. All divers are under 20\'s except the coach.They jump at 2 levels : the 1st level is at 85 ft.They called it amateur jump ( believe me it ain\'t amateur at all).The 2nd level is 150 ft .They called it pro performance. That is incredible act ! I love it.

594166496.name: Impressive show
594166496.author: a TripAdvisor user
594166496.reviewBody: Short but impressive diving show. \nIt\u2019s so hot that you wouldn\u2019t want to spend much longer there anyway.\nShows throughout the afternoon.

592510549.name: Must do
592510549.author: a TripAdvisor user
592510549.reviewBody: This is a must visit whilst in Acapulco. The divers put on a great show and the location is beautiful.

591549663.name: Beautiful
591549663.author: a TripAdvisor user
591549663.reviewBody: Excellent meal, reasonably priced with a wonderful view of the beach during sunset.  Something you won\'t want to forget you camera for.

589837216.name: Cliff Divers..A Spectactular Death Defying experience you must see in Acapulco!
589837216.author: a TripAdvisor user
589837216.reviewBody: Loved watching the cliff divers! They enter the ocean from the side the spectators are watching from, crawling barefoot and in nothing but a speedo down the cliff side. They then jump in the ocean and crawl up the cliff on the other side all the way up the top (40 meters) and then dive into a narrow area of ocean! Our tour guide Benjamin Alarcon took us at the best time and to the best location to see the divers. He bargained with the vendors selling their wares and we got great deals as we left. We also took photos with the divers afterwards..also something Benjamin arranged for us! If you are visiting Acapulco and want the best experience seeing the cliff divers, hire Benjamin for your tour guide. You can call me, Juli, and I will connect you with him. 503-960-1352!

589547883.name: Awesome divers.....
589547883.author: a TripAdvisor user
589547883.reviewBody: This is a must see for anyone visiting Acapulco.  It is my third time to visit and I never get tired of seeing the cliff divers.  They are amazing.  We have always sat at the restaurant to see the divers.  They have great margaritas and good fish tacos.  We had good service, great drinks and a wonderful view.  Loved it!

585429456.name: Nice view bad service
585429456.author: a TripAdvisor user
585429456.reviewBody: Service was bad.  Waiters doesn\u2019t care at all and food it\u2019s way lower quality than all Acapulco standards \nSorry but never again

583222261.name: A must see Attraction
583222261.author: a TripAdvisor user
583222261.reviewBody: We chose to pay for drinks at El Mirador Hotel\'s restaurant. We had a perfect table in the corner.it was a great spot to watch the divers climb down the steps, jump in the water and then scale the wall to prepare for their dive in this narrow opening between the rocks. We watched them watch the water go in and out in order to time the dive just right. Afterwards they greeted us, took pictures with us, sold us their autographed tee shirts. We also took a picture in front of the Acapulco sign right outside and then went across the street to the jewelry shop.

580643480.name: Very brave
580643480.author: a TripAdvisor user
580643480.reviewBody: Brave and amazing how these men dive from the cliff my only disappointment was that you pay a decent price to see them and they still wait at the exit for a tip \ud83d\ude21

579142020.name: Jumpers
579142020.author: a TripAdvisor user
579142020.reviewBody: well this is the one thing u must see in Acapulco it is what the city is famous for .... it is not overly exciting ... but it is pretty freaky to see the divers... I would never be brave enough to try something like jumping off a cliff...

577397195.name: Amazing - A must do!
577397195.author: a TripAdvisor user
577397195.reviewBody: The special show put on for the cruise ships was amazing and worth seeing in the day although apparently the regular night shows with flaming torches are even better.  Really quite spectacular - takes your breath away.

575747885.name: definitely an old MUST SEE
575747885.author: a TripAdvisor user
575747885.reviewBody: i was dreaming to see cliff divers of acapulco since i was a child. Today i was there and i was not disappointed at all. Parked the car easily on the street and walked into restaurante \u201eel mirador\u201c. Nice and welcoming staff was awaiting me and gave me a table with perfect view. Yes, the 300$ fish tacos with a coke were expensive for mexico, but, come on it is the loaction! And the tacos were fresh and tasted real good! The \u201eshow\u201c was amazing and it is really fascinating watching the clavados! A nice, once in a lifetime-must see-event\ud83d\udc4d

575729302.name: Very brave people
575729302.author: a TripAdvisor user
575729302.reviewBody: It was amazing to enjoy a very brave performance by the locals divers. The show practically have no cost. I recomend 100% to visit la quebrada

575600582.name: Amazing cliff divers!
575600582.author: a TripAdvisor user
575600582.reviewBody: We had Oscar Gomez as our tour guide for a private tour. The cliff divers were our first stop and clearly the highlight of the day. There was a lot to experience in Acapulco and Oscar did his best to show us around. He was very knowledgeable and informative. We saw old and new. I would suggest that tourist areas are safe but do not venture into the poor areas at night.\nThank you Oscar for such an informative andenjoyable tour.

573974315.name: Beautiful and scary
573974315.author: a TripAdvisor user
573974315.reviewBody: we watched these incredible young men scale the cliff with bare feet and then dive 50 meters into a narrow and rocky bay. Well worth the trip and not expensive unless you chose to watch from the restaurant.

571792018.name: It is one of the experience that we enjoyed.
571792018.author: a TripAdvisor user
571792018.reviewBody:
There are multiple divers diving from various heights. They are dare devils. The final jump is awesome. 

Notes- 
1. Reach early to the spot. 
2. The adult fees is 40 pesos. Kids below 7 are free. (there is no rule like this there but the people who give the ticket make this rule for kids). 
3. The last show @ 10 30 pm is fantastic. The final dive is with fire sticks in hand. 

Tips - 
1. The best way to watch this to stay at Hotel El Miradoor. They have a viewing deck next to the reception. But it is strictly for that hotel guests. 
2. The floor below that is a restaurant. That also gives a good view. You need to buy some food to book your space. 
3. The best suggestion would be to pay 40 pesos and watch them from a closer distance by arriving atleast 30 min early for the show. 
4. The show doesnt start on time. BUt you have to arrive 30 min before time. 
5. The music is very loud. If you are intolerant of loud music, please carry ear plugs. 

Very good show indeed. One of a kind of experience. DOnt miss it when you are in Acapulco. 

The whole show lasts for approx 20 min.

571546588.name: Unmissable!
571546588.author: a TripAdvisor user
571546588.reviewBody:
A brilliant show from the divers. 
We were there around 1.45 for the 2pm show, but there was barely a space to stand.
As we waited looking up towards the top of the cliff, we realised that the divers were climbing up the cliff from the bottom! Bare feet and hands climbing up the rock.

The diving was incredible. Watching as the divers waited for the exact moment for the tide to fill the inlet with water, then a magnificent dive outwards to avoid the jutting rocks. 

Not to be missed!

569119761.name: trying to make a business out of this....
569119761.author: a TripAdvisor user
569119761.reviewBody:
years back...we used to come and watch these brave men and 'kids' to jump into the waves below..and it was FREE ( they politely asked for donations then)
NOW... someone is trying hard to make a business out of this.....you speak English.... ahh... let's ask for $30 per person.... you speak Spanish....let's see, if they can pay at least 200 pesos....

you wanna sit on the beach... it is private.... pay money.... ok..you can sit here now.... you wanna see these rocks... money.... you wanna see guys jumping from the cliff... pay money... we look at you and we tell you  how much??? ( this is an experience of many visiting Mexico now)
Still great to see, but we did not pay them, as they heard us speaking English (because we had visitors with us from Canada) and were asking way too much money for it..maybe next time, when we play a role of poor Mexicans  :-O

568724403.name: Amazing
568724403.author: a TripAdvisor user
568724403.reviewBody: Had a delicious lunch at La Perla restaurant and then watched the high divers from a comfortable shaded table.  Spectacular show and view from the restaurant.  I am glad the tour guide recommended the lunch option because the food was fantastic!  I had a lightly batter fish that was so fresh I didn\u2019t need to use any of the garlic oil that accompanies it.  My husband had the fish tacos which were also delicious.  Highlight of our trip.  We got to meet the divers after the show and take a picture with them.

567480060.name: Amazing cliff diving
567480060.author: a TripAdvisor user
567480060.reviewBody: Went to watch the cliff diving, they charge 40 pesos per person . The height that the divers leep from is truly amazing!

565666446.name: A Must-do while in Acapulco
565666446.author: a TripAdvisor user
565666446.reviewBody: It\'s best to have some lunch at the hotel and view them from there. (It\'s shaded) These guys are spectacular. They scale up the cliff like spider men and then perform these crazy dives into a not-so-large sliver of water.

565152042.name: A must see
565152042.author: a TripAdvisor user
565152042.reviewBody: If you go to Acapulco you must see this. We were on a cruise and took a taxi from the ship (there are lots of taxi drivers outside the terminal building) there and back. The driver was really helpful. He explained there were different places to stand or sit and different prices for each option. We walked past the Acapulco sign, paid 40 pesos at the ticket booth, and walked down the steps to a vantage point opposite the point from which the divers jump. The show started just before 1pm and lasted around half an hour. We saw 6 divers climb about 35 metres up the cliff face ( a feat in itself !) and leap off forwards, and sometimes backwards, in spectacular fashion. These guys are fearless. Well worth your time and money.

564950243.name: Fantastic Acapulco Divers
564950243.author: a TripAdvisor user
564950243.reviewBody: 8 of us enjoyed the 4:30 show.   We sat in the handicap area as two of my family have walking problems. They do have ramps for wheel chair access.  You purchase your tickets purchase a beer from the local store or vendor and enjoy watching these young athletes take center stage. You can also watch this show from the water by renting a yacht.  They have a night show that is also spectacular. The cliff divers of Acapulco is great for all ages. You can buy t-shirts signed by the divers and have your picture taken with them..A must see when visiting Acapulco

564771354.name: La Quedabra
564771354.author: a TripAdvisor user
564771354.reviewBody: Place you have to go when you are in Acapulco.\nExperienced and professional divers.\nSomething you have to see when you are there. Only 40 pesos.

564718685.name: This is Must See Enthralling Experience in Acapulco
564718685.author: a TripAdvisor user
564718685.reviewBody: Our guide arranged for good seats for our party with great views of the 5 divers who took part. One of them dived 100 feet into the water and he needed to dive out three meters to miss the rocks. This was one of the highlights for us on our tour in Acapulco.\nReally brave young men and you meet them at the end of their show.

564441877.name: Go at sunset, even if you don\'t stay for the show!
564441877.author: a TripAdvisor user
564441877.reviewBody: I have been to Acapulco many times and have seen the cliff divers perform many times. This last visit, however, my friends took me to see the sunset at this beautiful location and it is something that is not to be missed. First, we saw spouting whales in the little cover, next we drank fresh coconut water and after that we watched the sun set. There were many other people enjoying this spot without the famed divers so we knew we were on to something. Don\'t miss this!

564055461.name: The experience is worthy of its fame
564055461.author: a TripAdvisor user
564055461.reviewBody: Watching the \u201c clavadistas\u201d jump into the tide is thrilling. We walked from the pier uphill to view this a\u00e9rea and it was worth every minute.

563958049.name: Excellent
563958049.author: a TripAdvisor user
563958049.reviewBody: The Cliff divers are fantastic and the view is beautiful! We spoke to the divers after and they told us that their entire family were cliff divers.

563364797.name: Traveled all the way from PA to see this!
563364797.author: a TripAdvisor user
563364797.reviewBody: It\'s amazing to see these guys climb up this cliff and dive like its nothing.  They make it look so easy.  Sat in the shade and drank the best margaritas watchin the show.  Loved it.

562956926.name: So Enjoyed
562956926.author: a TripAdvisor user
562956926.reviewBody: Stop and see the divers . Very fun and worth the stop. I driver to us there on our city tour. It was the highlight. Thanks for a great tour Jose Luis.

561595386.name: Great show
561595386.author: a TripAdvisor user
561595386.reviewBody:
We couldn’t leave Acapulco without visiting the Divers. It was 40 pesos 
With 5 divers. Each did a different dive. You have the choice of watching from the restaurant(air conditioned) with food or watch outside across from the cliff. We choose outside & got some amazing photos. It was hot & walking back up took our breath but was worth it
Lol. It is 4 metres between the cliff where we were & where the divers were so that not much room. They dived 41 metres from the cliff!! 
We got to take photos with the divers and gave them a tip. 
This was part of our excursion and our driver/tour guide named David was wonderful. He waited with everything we did. We asked to stop at a retro get lunch & he waited for us. Thank you David for. Great experience. 
H

561308924.name: Cliff Divers
561308924.author: a TripAdvisor user
561308924.reviewBody: Excellent venue highly recommend as it is worth the visit. The divers are spectacular and put on a great show.

560711286.name: nice promenade!
560711286.author: a TripAdvisor user
560711286.reviewBody: good place to take a walk . we took a taxi to go there and walked up the bordwalk all the way to the quebrada place .there was a big \'\' acapulco \'\' sign , great for photos! there was  \'\'stars\'\' on the ground with the names of famous celebritys including elvis and j.f.k...   nice boutique with overprices items.and nice hotel too.was it open or closed ?   mystery.if you go , ask about the time of the divers. the dive at a high similar as the redbull divers ....nice afternoon there and we came back walking downhill toward the cathedral at the zocalo.

560617702.name: simply amazing
560617702.author: a TripAdvisor user
560617702.reviewBody: I went to the afternoon show,the divers climb up the cliff and when they are ready they have to time the wave because they are up over 100 ft and when the wave comes in they have only 12 feet there.Very dangerious tough way to earn a living

560603449.name: Okay, But Not Great
560603449.author: a TripAdvisor user
560603449.reviewBody: We paid more for a table at a restaurant overlooking the cliff where the divers went, and it might have been a little too far away from the action. It probably would be better to go down to the observation area (where, obviously, the more clued in tourists went).

559469244.name: Amazing
559469244.author: a TripAdvisor user
559469244.reviewBody: We attended the lunch show and the night fire show. Lunch was delightful and great value with the show. Night time is spectacular...buy the shirt ($8)! Take $ or pesos to tip the divers...that is what they work for\ud83d\ude09At night we saw a young Nino maybe 7 who also jumped\ud83d\ude16scarey.

558698956.name: Its no wonder that this is the most popura attraction in Acapulco
558698956.author: a TripAdvisor user
558698956.reviewBody: You will be mesmerised with these divers jumping off high cliff. Our biggest surprise was that to get up there they simply climbed up almost vertical cliff wall, in our book probably the most dangerous part of the show. Go at least an hour before the show if you want to have unobstructed view.

557441396.name: Breath Taking Event
557441396.author: a TripAdvisor user
557441396.reviewBody: When in Acapulco, the cliff divers are a must.  Entrance cost is $40 pesos or $2.50 USD.  The divers are incredible, climbing up the cliff of 35 meters to dive into approximately 3 meters of water.  Don\u2019t miss the silver jewelry store across the street for some reasonably priced silver from the area.

556532316.name: Death Defying Divers!
556532316.author: a TripAdvisor user
556532316.reviewBody: The Cliff Divers are amazing!The divers scale the cliffs      with spider-like agility. It is almost unbearable to watch  them dive!   There is very little room for error. Still they dive with confidence and grace.

556329692.name: Divers
556329692.author: a TripAdvisor user
556329692.reviewBody: A must stop the cliff divers are brave and gave a great show! This is also where did one of his scenes. Make sure you have a camera. The night show is suppose to be fantastic.

555736820.name: A must in Acapulco
555736820.author: a TripAdvisor user
555736820.reviewBody: Not only because of the movie by Elvis Presley but because it is a must see diving show. I see it every time I have a chance when visiting Acapulco

555503244.name: Incredible show of strength, dexterity, balance, timing, bravery, and skill
555503244.author: a TripAdvisor user
555503244.reviewBody: Everyone I suppose has seen pictures of the divers at La Quebrada. But I was not prepared for the reality and the scope of what they performed. They free-climbed the rock wall with the ease of mountain goats, then jostled with other as they stood on the edge of the cliff, 35 meters above the water below which also clearly was a few feet forward of their position at the top. It was an feat I would like to see several times. They made us feel at ease, that they were capable of the feats they were performing and we were not to worry on their behalf. If they would have shown any reluctance to perform their dives and climb the wall, I would not have been able to witness it.\n

555305314.name: Evening Fun
555305314.author: a TripAdvisor user
555305314.reviewBody: We enjoyed the show, my kids were super excited each time a person would jump. We watched from the El Mirador restaurant. We paid for the Quebrada show and two drinks for 170 pesos. The food was expensive for what it was so we are somewhere else on our way back to the hotel. The Quebrada show Is a half hour of fun.

555203201.name: Cool!
555203201.author: a TripAdvisor user
555203201.reviewBody: I went at night and there were people selling food and souvenirs on the street. The show was great, however, depending on where you stand to watch the show you may not be able to see everything. The boys who were diving were very entertaining.

554985216.name: Thrilling
554985216.author: a TripAdvisor user
554985216.reviewBody: We did a tour with tour by Van with Rudy and it included this stop.  Our tour got us the best seats in the house while every one else had to stand in the hot sun.  It was so thrilling to see these men dive.  It was the highlight of our tour in Acapulco.

554310083.name: Its amazing
554310083.author: a TripAdvisor user
554310083.reviewBody: Its really nice and interesting to see the cliff divers. They have food they have a lot of things around.

553823916.name: Goo, as expected
553823916.author: a TripAdvisor user
553823916.reviewBody: There is not much to say because this is the most famous thing in Acapulco and everyone already knows what to expect. We still think it is worth seeing on every trip.

553252062.name: Don\u2019t miss this place
553252062.author: a TripAdvisor user
553252062.reviewBody: Incredible experience in Acapulco, you coming to this City you need to go to La Quebrada. . The show take about 15 minutes , try to hire a cab , shipper. And in the end you will take a picture with all the divers.

551909609.name: Some boys jumping of a cliff
551909609.author: a TripAdvisor user
551909609.reviewBody: To be honest - not impressed. The boys had great jumps - they jump from a 30m cliff. They are surely not diving, just jumping off the cliff. And to watch that you have to pay 40 pesos. Same show can be watched from the road which is 50m away and you just cant see the last part of the jump.

551854709.name: Cliff diving show
551854709.author: a TripAdvisor user
551854709.reviewBody: Great show of a must see in Acapulco. We saw the noon show and we were please to find a clean and neat place. I recommend to arrive early to find your favorite spot to enjoy the show. You can bring your favorite drinks and snacks but collect all your garbage. The fee to access is about 2 US dollars, the best place for people with accessibility needs is the restaurant \u201cel mirador\u201d. Make sure to tip the divers since they risk their lives every time they jump from the 100ft cliffs.

551790001.name: Awesome!\ud83d\udc4f\ud83c\udffc
551790001.author: a TripAdvisor user
551790001.reviewBody: A well spent afternoon with your family. A true iconic, unique place in Acapulco - \u201cLa Quebrada\u201d. Highly recommended.

551627114.name: December vacation 2017
551627114.author: a TripAdvisor user
551627114.reviewBody: This is the second time I have been to see the cliff divers.  I was a bit disappointed as their were only 3 divers.  The prior time, about 2 years ago there were at least 6 divers.  It is amazing to watch them climb up the cliff and then to make the high dive.  I highly recommend this for anyone visiting Acapulco.

551620179.name: Very nice!
551620179.author: a TripAdvisor user
551620179.reviewBody: Amazing watching the jumpers climb and then dive.  Very cool.  Nice dinner but not the best we had.  It was a Christmas buffet- there where some good portions, but not everything

551304226.name: Nails in the dash board EXCITING!
551304226.author: a TripAdvisor user
551304226.reviewBody: We have visited Acapulco several times over the years and this is our fav attraction. The divers are all amazing and the night show is spectacular! There is so much old world charm in old town Acapulco - we love it!

550524860.name: Adrenaline Rush!
550524860.author: a TripAdvisor user
550524860.reviewBody: La Quebrada-one of the most famous places in Acapulco and definitely a place you must visit. This was a one of the attractions of the day trip we too with Sebastian Hernandez \n(our local tour guide) - what fun we had.  The divers entertain tourists by jumping off two cliffs - about 40 and 80 feet high. First the divers jump off the lower cliff then climbing up to the high one...after short prayer to the Lady of Guadalupe (chapel devoted to her is at the top of the cliff) divers showing off their skills. Cliff diving has a long tradition in Acapulco, but it was not until 1934 that La Quebrada Cliff Divers was formed.  Great show, very entertaining - and to the young boys/divers - be safe out there.  Also - it is not related to the to divers - there is a nice , colorful ACAPULCO sign to take souvenir picture in front of.

550044125.name: Wow
550044125.author: a TripAdvisor user
550044125.reviewBody:
What a site to see these cliff divers not only dive but then watch them climb back up to the top.

we saw them from the bay which put us a little further away, but 3 divers swam out to our boat for pictures.

This is a must see if ever in Acapulco, Mexico.

549272237.name: Great
549272237.author: a TripAdvisor user
549272237.reviewBody: A must if this is your first time to Acapulco.  We chose the option with the meal in the restaurant overlooking the cliff

548597630.name: Super Cool!
548597630.author: a TripAdvisor user
548597630.reviewBody: This was so cool to watch. These divers are amazing. We saw the 1 pm show, which was super hot\u2014the only downside. They put on a very entertaining show, but it is short.

547432295.name: Excellent viewing platform
547432295.author: a TripAdvisor user
547432295.reviewBody: Our tour guide bought us here to view the cliff divers and we ended up having the fish tacos (fantastic as well\ud83d\udc4d). Great viewing platform as well for the divers\ud83d\ude00

545575942.name: Perfect Spot to Eat
545575942.author: a TripAdvisor user
545575942.reviewBody: The view in this picture is from sitting at the restaurant and awaiting the cliff divers to perform their stunts.  The restaurant offers delicious food and it\'s the perfect seating spot to observe the cliff divers.

543300941.name: Unforgetable
543300941.author: a TripAdvisor user
543300941.reviewBody: The climb undertaken by the divers to get to where they jump is as impressive as the dive.It takes your breath away.Very little margin for error.Well worth a visit.

542852930.name: Amazing
542852930.author: a TripAdvisor user
542852930.reviewBody: Our tour guide Roberto Alarcon brought us for lunch here on our tour. What an amazing experience watching these talented divers.

540283262.name: Bucket list item
540283262.author: a TripAdvisor user
540283262.reviewBody: Been dreaming of this since I was a kid watching ABC wide world of sports.  Only lasts 1/2 hr but worth the trip as there is so much to see in the area

540051221.name: Must see
540051221.author: a TripAdvisor user
540051221.reviewBody: Cliff divers at night with dinner fantastic experience and good food. Must do in Acapulco very exciting \n

539394500.name: Timeless stop
539394500.author: a TripAdvisor user
539394500.reviewBody: Our tour got us onto the patio of the hotel so we did not have to climb the 71 steps down and up.  View was good and photos turned out well.  getting to meet the divers was fun too.

539328392.name: Pleasantly Surprised
539328392.author: a TripAdvisor user
539328392.reviewBody: We were less than enthusiastic about this part of our tour as we thought it would be a bit tame. However, we were so wrong. The sight of these divers climbing up the rocks with no safety harness was scary enough, but the diving was spectacular once they had climbed the rocks. Worth adding to a bucket list.

538593410.name: Awsome view!
538593410.author: a TripAdvisor user
538593410.reviewBody: We went to see the cliff divers and were amazed by the dives!  One diver dove from half way up the cliff.  The remaining divers dove from the top of the cliff.  Before they dove they made the sign of the cross, waited for the water to roll in then they DOVE!  it was fantastic!  After the dives they divers came over and took pictures with the crowd of tourists.  We also purchased a t-shirt for a few dollars.  All the t-shirts were signed by the divers.

538378355.name: Great views of the divers from the hotel
538378355.author: a TripAdvisor user
538378355.reviewBody: Our tour guide organised a private area for us to watch the divers. Well worth the $7 for a beer. Excellent show.

538171843.name: Good cheap fun
538171843.author: a TripAdvisor user
538171843.reviewBody: It has been years since I went to see the divers at Acapulco and it is still an iconic experience. The road up to La Quebrada has been improved and the parking was organised. We paid 30 pesos to park our car. The entrance to the divers is 40 pesos for adults and 15 for children. The tones are on the photograph. 1pm,7:30, 8:30,9:30 and 10:30. We went for the 7:30 showing and arrived just before it started. Even so we still had a fair view of the show. It was off peak so it is probably best to get there early to get a good spot. The 10:30 show has the last diver holding torches but the 7:30 showing was still pretty exciting with the speedo clad divers waiting for the swell to be just right before they leapt. After the dives the divers climb back up to talk to the audience, collect tips, you can take photos with them and they are willing to answer questions. My son asked are you scared and received the answer of, \u201cevery time...\u201d I can certainly see why, as they jump nearly 40 meters into an unpredictable sea! Definitely worth a visit!

535784401.name: Vacation
535784401.author: a TripAdvisor user
535784401.reviewBody: This is a must to see. It is a very dangerous job and was amazing how they time their dives with the waves.

535511302.name: Loved it!
535511302.author: a TripAdvisor user
535511302.reviewBody: Great show and the restaurant food was delicious try the enchiladas.  Great view beautiful place...highly recommend

532478399.name: Romantic Dinner with a Spectacular Show
532478399.author: a TripAdvisor user
532478399.reviewBody: The divers were incredible! I couldn\'t believe how they risk their lives diving from the top of this cliff and into the water! I\'m from Hollywood, California, and this show beat any of the ones I saw at home! I loved it! The food was also delicious. I drank their water and there was no need for bottled water. The service was also so kind and courteous. My favorite part was posing with the divers for photos and giving them tips. They train for over nine years to dive for this show. I would definitely return again. Take your date here for an unforgettable night!

532148660.name: Entertaining, but crowded and hot
532148660.author: a TripAdvisor user
532148660.reviewBody:
I'd seen the video before, but there's no substitute for watching people dive headfirst off a 100+ foot cliff in person. It's pretty amazing what they can do!

We came on a cruise ship tour, which meant it was very crowded. If you come on a tour, skip the shop that they tell you to wait in (even though it is air conditioned) and head down to get yourself a good vantage point. You want to actually be able to see them hit the water to get the full experience. 

It's worth going, but prepared for crowds and heat.

530363180.name: Exciting diving exhibition
530363180.author: a TripAdvisor user
530363180.reviewBody: No trip to Viejo Acapulco is complete without a trip to La Quebrada to see the divers tempt fate as they dive into the narrow gorge on the oncoming waves. The exhibition is neither expensive nor long, but it certainly is exciting. I\'d recommend you avoid the hot sun at the 1:00 pm show and go to one of the evening presentations. You might even want to buy a commemorative t-shirt from a diver afterwards. Fun for kids over 8 and adults.

526022705.name: Must see
526022705.author: a TripAdvisor user
526022705.reviewBody: Just want to say that this was one of many great thing we did out here. We where out here for 4 nights 5 days. And did coastal tours and city tour . It was the best way to experience Acapulco most beautiful sites. I am not going to lie me ad my boyfriend were a bit nervous do to the way the news has portrayed this wonderful bay. But once being there we notice that it is not how they picture. It a safe place to come and enjoy and get away from our routinely life style. But this tour it self closed the deal for us. Jose the tour man was a great intellectual respectful person. Hands down great tour  services. Highly recommended

521536303.name: Cliff Divers during the day.
521536303.author: a TripAdvisor user
521536303.reviewBody: They were amazing. Lots of young children diving and selling souvenirs in the area. Worth the drive.

520347220.name: Cliff Divers from La Quebrada
520347220.author: a TripAdvisor user
520347220.reviewBody: A unique thing which only takes place in Acapulco, this is why I can recommend it. Bring a headcover, it can take a while until they all jumped.

518191378.name: Pretty cool!
518191378.author: a TripAdvisor user
518191378.reviewBody: The story behind the cliff diving was very interesting and I am glad that I got to see them diving. Personally I wouldn\'t make a dinner out of it though.

513964881.name: La Quebrada.- The Famous Cliff Divers in Acapulco.- Its Unique.
513964881.author: a TripAdvisor user
513964881.reviewBody: There is no other place in the world like "La Quebrada", The Cliff Divers Show in Acapulco its absolutely UNIQUE. A must for anyone\u00b4s "Bucket List" of what to do while visiting Mexico.

512390008.name: A Sensational Must See Attraction if you are visiting Acapulco
512390008.author: a TripAdvisor user
512390008.reviewBody: This was number 1 thing on my wife\'s list to see. Our driver and guide Angel recommended the 1:00PM diving which fit our schedule. I wasn\'t able to go all the way down the many steps due to recent foot surgery but Angel took me to an stone patio enclosure where I could sit on a chair and have a perfect view. My wife and daughter went all the way down. The view of the mountain rock Cliffs are unbelievably beautiful and the atmosphere there is wonderful. We watched these very brave young men driver climb up the rock cliff bare-footed. I couldn\'t help but worry for their safety the whole time I was there. The 3rd young diver hurt his left foot climbing up and had his leg bent up as it must have been quite painful to stand. Another young diver came over and looked at his leg they must have stood there 30 minutes wondering what do. The only option was for the diver with hurt foot to jump from where he was, which he did after the 3 other dived. One super diver was at the very top of the rock and he was the only one to jump from there and he was the last one to jump. He prayed to the shrine of Mary that is on the top rock several times before he took his dive, and he turned a flip during his dive as did a couple of other. I believe all the divers prayed before they jumped. We met the divers on the way out and gave them a generous tip and asked for a picture with them. There were all very positive friendly young men. A couple of them appeared to be no more that 13-14 years of age. The one who dived from the top was the tallest I believe! To me all of these young men are giving a tremendous sacrifice to dive from this rock 2 times a day! This is an extremely dangerous feat and my heart goes out to all of them, as well as all of the other previous retired divers who have been doing this since the 50s.

510653286.name: a must
510653286.author: a TripAdvisor user
510653286.reviewBody: Costs 30-40 pesos per person to go in to the viewing area. This gets you a show of about 5-6 dives. Awesome to see.

510319250.name: What a wonderful night!
510319250.author: a TripAdvisor user
510319250.reviewBody: I\'ve never seen such a amazing show.\nThat guys are "crazy". Divers entertain tourists by jumping off of two ledges on the cliff, one that is 40 feet (12 m) high and the top one which is 80 feet (24 m) high. The divers must calculate the right moment to jump to catch an incoming wave and avoid serious injury or death. Occasionally jumpers dive with a torch.

510241292.name: we watched the divers as we ate a delicious lunch.
510241292.author: a TripAdvisor user
510241292.reviewBody: the divers were professionals, great form and great skill.  So brave as well.  The lunch was excellent.

508585169.name: Have your camera ready!
508585169.author: a TripAdvisor user
508585169.reviewBody:
Sebastian of acapulcoforall.com took a group of us on the city tour. He is great I highly recommend him for tours and even airport transfers. He offers beer and even as a bottle of tequila you can pour yourself a shot during the tour.

Awesome sight! Amazing view and fearless divers! This is a MUST see while in Acapulco!

Be sure to tip the divers afterwards.

507922829.name: Alcapulco sight seeing tours
507922829.author: a TripAdvisor user
507922829.reviewBody: The chapel of peace was a beautiful sight. The history and origins of the building was interesting, including how it evolved from a Catholic chapel, and is now open to all denominations.\nThe cliff diving sight was awesome, a must see sight during your time here. Our driver stopped at the John Wayne and Tarzan character building. We were able to have delicious snacks and the John Wayne signature drink from a coconut. Later, we ventured to a popular restaurant where many locals were swimming beachside. We were able to sit inside and view the sights, enjoying the atmosphere.

506300192.name: Excellent diving show
506300192.author: a TripAdvisor user
506300192.reviewBody: One of the most spectacular attractions in Mexico. Profesional divers climb to the top of the cliff to dive into a narrow sea strip with a high level of difficulty and risk. A local tradition of many years that every tourist must visit. One of the highest in the world. A must.\nDay and night show. Both are different and worth it. It just depends on your day.\nIf you want a table at the restaurant you should make a reservation.

506265190.name: Have to do it.
506265190.author: a TripAdvisor user
506265190.reviewBody: When in Acapulco, right?  Neat area and restaurant. The divers were amazing to watch.  Enjoyed the history of the area.

505639486.name: This was nice to finally get to see!
505639486.author: a TripAdvisor user
505639486.reviewBody: We had a good lunch and watched a exciting show by the cliff divers.  That show was on my Moms bucket list to see, we got it checked off and she loved it.

505233197.name: Cliff Divers show
505233197.author: a TripAdvisor user
505233197.reviewBody: We did the daytime show because we want to catch them diving in still photos and video cliffs. Super impressive !

504582229.name: Living on the Edge
504582229.author: a TripAdvisor user
504582229.reviewBody: La Quebrada are many things, a special place near a sea cave called la Cueva del Diablo (The devil\'s cave), a place where cliff divers risk their lives everyday and an historical and traditional place in the old Acapulco.\nLa Quebrada is worth going mostly by both, this is where you will have the best view of the cliff divers getting in the water at the most unexpected moment. If you are going by foot and looking from the terrace be ready, it gets crowded very fast and you might not see anything the first time. Go with time to catch the first line spot and be able to look deep in the water where the cliff divers will disappear. \nGoosebumps garanteed!

502970543.name: Great
502970543.author: a TripAdvisor user
502970543.reviewBody: We saw 6 divers from the age of 7 to 38 diving. We waited a long time before they dived. Some did flips and some did back dives. Cost 40 pesos each.

502636852.name: Cliff Divers
502636852.author: a TripAdvisor user
502636852.reviewBody: This was the location of the cliff divers.  You will be amazed at how high the divers just from, truly incredible.  You should find the time to go watch their show.  There are a number of divers who jump from different heights.

502332742.name: Diving show
502332742.author: a TripAdvisor user
502332742.reviewBody: The experience watching the divings is incredible. The guys are so talented and it seems they have trained a lot. The entrance to a very good place for watching the show is very cheap.

500868437.name: Cliff diving!
500868437.author: a TripAdvisor user
500868437.reviewBody: Went on tour with tour guide Roberto Alarcon! It was fun and we ate at the restaurant, which was good.

500560597.name: Classic
500560597.author: a TripAdvisor user
500560597.reviewBody: It\'s a great place to see a native pleople to see how brave they are to Jump from ceirtan altitud becarse in the bottom it very full of rocks so they have to be very experience

500075213.name: A must...!!!!!!!!!!
500075213.author: a TripAdvisor user
500075213.reviewBody:
35 mts jump from "La quebrada" every day in this beautiful place of old Acapulco.
Great views from a Yacht are suggested. Do not miss this experience!!!!!!  Every day starting at 8 pm. And at 10 pm divers jump with torches.

Bravo!!!!

498329517.name: Iconic  Acapulco cliff divers , rain or shine!
498329517.author: a TripAdvisor user
498329517.reviewBody:
We were there when it was raining, and if you are there when it's wet, watch your step on the slippery floors. The cliff divers are amazing- there's a prayer station on the cliff, and some of the divers pray as they prepare themselves for the dive. Why is equally amazing is how they climb back up the rocky humongous cliff.
Very touristy, but breathtaking cliffs and diving.  As you leave, the cliff divers are there to receive their well deserved tips.

You can see the cliff diver site in Fun in Acapulco, the Elvis Presley film. Spoiler alert: guess who takes a leap off the cliff at the end of the  movie?

494960779.name: Great Food and great viwe of the famous Cliff Diving
494960779.author: a TripAdvisor user
494960779.reviewBody: The place has many great seats with a view of the Wolrd Famous cliff diving. sure you can stand it the sun and get a little closer or sit here and watch it all. if you have trouble walking this is a must.

494607880.name: Cliff Divers
494607880.author: a TripAdvisor user
494607880.reviewBody: Wow was cool, watching them climb the rocks then jump off, was really neat to watch, do the show with drinks its cheaper

493367731.name: Cliff Divers
493367731.author: a TripAdvisor user
493367731.reviewBody: Saw the evening (730pm) performance.  It was quite interesting!  Get there early to take advantage of the food and shopping.

493030922.name: Exciting and Must see
493030922.author: a TripAdvisor user
493030922.reviewBody: This is a must when in Acapulco. Cliff Divers make a very exciting show. Very inexpensive  and fantastic... make sure you tip them well! PS: make sure you arrive early and get a good spot where you can see the water and diving area otherwise very difficult tio see with all the people . For 180 pesos or so you can also see the divers from the restaurant .... less crowded...

491198152.name: A must visit to all tourists
491198152.author: a TripAdvisor user
491198152.reviewBody: The cliff divers of Acapulco is one of the iconic activities of the city.  For decades, a small group of divers have been performing, diving from ever increasing heights along the cliff.  \nThe square above the stairs and viewing platform is usually full of vendors selling everything from flavored ices to souvenirs.\nThe best and cheapest way to see the divers is down the stairs and with the crowd.

489222772.name: Definitely worth a first-time visit.
489222772.author: a TripAdvisor user
489222772.reviewBody: Well past its glory days but a must if you\'ve never been.  It\'s so unique and traditional to Acapulco and so much a part of its history .... reminders of which are everywhere.   Buy a ticket at the hotel for one beer, \'cause that way you\'ll get a good seat & viewing location.  (you\'ll want that drink, as you wait for the whole show to slowly unfold;  and it\'s the same price no matter when or where you buy it.).  Read up a bit beforehand and it will be much more interesting.

485776616.name: Amazing and very cheap
485776616.author: a TripAdvisor user
485776616.reviewBody: This is totally worth visit, the divers go all the way to the ocean while they interact with the people and then they climb the rocks to reach the point where they are going to jump.\nIt costs 40 pesos plus they ask for a tip at the end of the show so its basically like 5 dollars for a wonderful show.

485096618.name: Classic Cliff Divers
485096618.author: a TripAdvisor user
485096618.reviewBody: This is a must do for Acapulco. You can view the divers and dine or drink from La Perla which has  side view of the divers, The food is nothing to write home about but you can\'t go wrong with Tequila shots The best view is if you walk all the way down the stairs to a concrete platform. You have a closer frontal view from there. After the dives you can go back up the stairs and meet the divers personally. They are readily available for photo ops  with a nominal tip.

484752334.name: A must see in acapjlco
484752334.author: a TripAdvisor user
484752334.reviewBody: Apparently the divers are children and grandchildren of past divers and acapulco is famous for their divers. Have several shows a day (at least 2 or 3 ) a must see

484530429.name: Cliff Dive Show
484530429.author: a TripAdvisor user
484530429.reviewBody: Show was nice and very quick.. So you really can\'t be eating your food or having a conversation while they\'re diving it happens so fast.  It\'s amazing how they dive off the high cliff.

483668038.name: It never gets old
483668038.author: a TripAdvisor user
483668038.reviewBody: To watch the men jump never gets old.  We walked from the main drag and it was a nice walk if you are a little fit.  It costs 20 pesos each for the entrance fee and drinks may be purchased below at a price.  Tipping is encouraged to the men.

483547094.name: A must do in Acapulco
483547094.author: a TripAdvisor user
483547094.reviewBody: I found this an excellent attraction and the must do in Acapulco.  It is inexpensive, great viewing from across the cliff for excellent views. If you wish, there are numerous choices for food.

482789452.name: GREAT NIGHT
482789452.author: a TripAdvisor user
482789452.reviewBody: There is a restaurant at the HOTEL MIRADOR, named LA PERLA where you can eat great food while enjoying the shows. I strongly suggest to get there by 8:30 pm so you can see the last one with torches\u2026 not to miss if you dare to go to ACAPULCO

480729924.name: So much fun!
480729924.author: a TripAdvisor user
480729924.reviewBody: You really should not go to Acapulco without visiting the cliff divers show. It is only $40 MXN to watch the young men do their dives, and they put on quite the show. I would recommend going around sunset for the nice lighting.

480705702.name: Cliff diving
480705702.author: a TripAdvisor user
480705702.reviewBody: Your in Acapulco!  You have to see the famous cliff divers. It\'s reasonable price makes it a must. The show is not too long so it doesn\'t take too much time out of your day.

479624576.name: Amazing place.
479624576.author: a TripAdvisor user
479624576.reviewBody: Very unique place. Amazing views and entertainment watching the divers. Popular place. Breathtaking moment watching the last diver jump from the highest cliff. Worth to visit! Amazing sunset.

478873231.name: Divers Deluxe!!
478873231.author: a TripAdvisor user
478873231.reviewBody: Watching the divers here was amazing!!  There was plenty of shade, cold drinks, and hot food.  Much better than standing out in the hot sun!!  I would come here again!

478683274.name: Brave divers-short show
478683274.author: a TripAdvisor user
478683274.reviewBody: The view is great. Watching the divers is breathtaking but it doesn\'t last more than 15 mins considering they could be diving to their death. But the show started in the 60\'s I believe and still goes on today.

478014126.name: Amazing View and Show and Lunch
478014126.author: a TripAdvisor user
478014126.reviewBody: Acapulco is well known for its Cliff Diving Show.  These divers do put on a good show.  Its not a fast paced show, but still incredible to see.  Make sure to get to the restaurant early so you can get a good table, have lunch and watch the show.  Its iconic if nothing else.

477132034.name: Thrilling and Dangerous
477132034.author: a TripAdvisor user
477132034.reviewBody: Always a thrill to see these daring young divers! Be sure to stay for lunch, as the fish tacos were awesome!

475863131.name: Perfect attraction here, a must go when you visit Acapulco
475863131.author: a TripAdvisor user
475863131.reviewBody: If you really want to see professional acrobats who challenge dead every minute, by the way in a gorgeous view, you must visit this place in the heart of old Acapulco. A perfect place to visit with family or kids and spend a great t\ud83d\udc4d\ud83c\udffb me in the local culture

475392725.name: Great Views for Cliff Diving
475392725.author: a TripAdvisor user
475392725.reviewBody: Went on a tour with Acapulco for All and we came here for lunch.  Saw the cliff diving show and took pictures with the divers.  I had fish tacos with a Corona and it was quite good.  They have lunch specials for $12 which includes a meal and 1 drink.  Warning: They do except US dollars, but their exchange is terrible.  Tip: Come with pesos or charge to your credit card.

475155454.name: Must see
475155454.author: a TripAdvisor user
475155454.reviewBody: Impressive young men. We watched the show from a restaurant called La Perla booked for us by our tour guide Sebastian Hernandez (please check him out at Acapulcoforall.com). I suppose you could pay the entrance fee and watch it at the deck level but our view from the restaurant was amazing. Plus you can sit and enjoy the view while waiting for the divers to climb up the cliff and start the jump.

474680514.name: thrilling!!  Heartbeat to the max speed
474680514.author: a TripAdvisor user
474680514.reviewBody: What an amazing group of athletes, perfection is an understatement. amazing views from the restaurant and the guys are so friendly and nice . Awesome tradition worth every minute and every dollar to watch, day or night!

473962746.name: CLIFF DIVERS
473962746.author: a TripAdvisor user
473962746.reviewBody: This show is a must-see in Acapulco.  The divers dive from a height three times that of the Olympic divers.

473491419.name: Private
473491419.author: a TripAdvisor user
473491419.reviewBody: Paid for a great view with a drink but I think we could\'ve had a better experience on our own. Met a couple of the divers and it was amazing to see their dives!

473464793.name: Just relax dont expect great choices.
473464793.author: a TripAdvisor user
473464793.reviewBody: If you are there for the divers, its fine. Small choice of food selections and nothing special. Too bad because service & location was great.

473012705.name: Amazing cliff divers
473012705.author: a TripAdvisor user
473012705.reviewBody: These cliff divers were astonishing!  Good lunch and view!  Bring your video camera as it goes very quickly!

472967705.name: Amazing evening!
472967705.author: a TripAdvisor user
472967705.reviewBody: Our driver, Angel Flores, recommended that we see the cliff divers at night. We were not disappointed! From the time they come down the stairs of the plaza, climb down one cliff, dive in, swim across, and climb up the face of the cliff bare-handed and bare-footed, the whole crowd was in awe. One by one, they amazed.

472781311.name: What a sight to see
472781311.author: a TripAdvisor user
472781311.reviewBody: The divers are very impressive. Climbing up the side of the cliffs, preparing for the dive and nailing it at the right time. Couldn\'t be a better stop at 1:00 during the day to view such talented men.

472020192.name: Cliff divers
472020192.author: a TripAdvisor user
472020192.reviewBody: We enjoyed seeing the cliff divers. We ate dinner at the restaurant, and it was only so-so. I think I\'d skip that and just watch the talented divers.

471769784.name: Amazing
471769784.author: a TripAdvisor user
471769784.reviewBody: Went with my wife and I to watch the amazing cliff divers at La Quebrada. It was an awesome experience. You can either sit at the restaurant and have a fantastic Meal which is quite reasonable or you can go down to the viewing area to get a closer look of the divers. Either way is great the service was fantastic. The views were amazing. Highly highly recommend you do this.

471542546.name: WOW ! La Quebrada, very impressive !
471542546.author: a TripAdvisor user
471542546.reviewBody: When in Acapulco, La Quebrada is a MUST SEE ! We went for diner at 8:15pm saw 3 shows, (8:30pm 9:30pm 10:30pm) each of them exciting and different. The 10:30pm show is very impressive when the last diver goes down with flames.  It is worth to pay for the dinner which include a 3 course meal and 2 drinks for only $499 pesos (approx. $30.00 canadian). The cheese cake is absolutely delicious!

470561336.name: Cliff divers
470561336.author: a TripAdvisor user
470561336.reviewBody: Cool show, a little hard for a 2 year old to sit through so the wife and I passed him back and forth, but overall a good show and the food was amazing.

469754422.name: Amazing place to visit from the sea
469754422.author: a TripAdvisor user
469754422.reviewBody: It is amazing to see how people jump from there every day insane to see it from the boat in order to feel the high and the low bottom depth !! Totally recommended!!

469750589.name: Once in a lifetime opportunity
469750589.author: a TripAdvisor user
469750589.reviewBody: We watched the show from the restaurant. You can do that or watch from the cheaper viewing area below. We got there just before the 9:30 show. We saw the 9:30 show and then they turned the lights off and jumped by fire light. It was amazing! The divers were outside to take pictures and ask for tips. Lol!

469163354.name: Senior citizens
469163354.author: a TripAdvisor user
469163354.reviewBody: As reviews of la Perla restaurant were not good, we decided to opt for the 40 peso viewing area.  It was not overly crowded for the 7:30 show.  We found there was a reserved viewing deck for senior citizens and the disabled (just ask) which was very nice as we had chairs in a perfect spot for watching the dives.  One can purchase drinks and snacks as well.  Enjoyable and a classic Acapulco experience.

468990036.name: Amazing
468990036.author: a TripAdvisor user
468990036.reviewBody: A must see in Acapulco!! Amazing! I couldn\'t believe that they climbed up the side of the cliffs so quickly. Call Baldo Gomez and book this tour. :)

468982228.name: Acapulco still the best!
468982228.author: a TripAdvisor user
468982228.reviewBody:
We enjoyed watching the young men  dive down into the ocean!
It was nice to see that they say a prayer every time they dive down.
it's a must to see,only in Acapulco.
😊 enjoy!!

468355456.name: Too long
468355456.author: a TripAdvisor user
468355456.reviewBody: Went here about 12:50 for 1 pm show.  5 dives lasted 45 minutes.  That\'s it. Waited for a diver to swim out to watching boats and collect tips before they would dive. Started diving at 1:25.  Needless to say it was hot and people were crowding around the lower area. 157 steps to get back to the top. Great exercise and 30 peso beer to buy while waiting.  Ok to say we did it but will not be back.

468328249.name: adventure
468328249.author: a TripAdvisor user
468328249.reviewBody: the view is very good and the place is really nice \nthe guys who make the show and jump in the sea  are experts and it was nice show

467412907.name: Worth visiting when in acapulco
467412907.author: a TripAdvisor user
467412907.reviewBody: One of the traditions in acapulco is la quebrada, very nice show, divers are incredible it\'s a must when in acapulco

466518009.name: Included as part of city tour
466518009.author: a TripAdvisor user
466518009.reviewBody: The divers climb the cliff with bare feet , bless themselves , milk the crowd for applause, then take a death defying dive into the water. I went at 1 pm and it was very hot. Luckily there was a cold bottle of water plus a cool air conditioned car driven by David Alcaraz(davidalcaraz822@gmail)

466165566.name: A beautiful location, but
466165566.author: a TripAdvisor user
466165566.reviewBody: The area is in need of some TLC. Beautiful old buildings. I visited it 20 years ago and it was shabby, now even more so.

466107674.name: Cliff divers
466107674.author: a TripAdvisor user
466107674.reviewBody: Good tacos with a nice view. You can have lunch while watching the cliff divers jump from cliffs into the water. Nice short activity that does not cost too much.

465861256.name: Fun
465861256.author: a TripAdvisor user
465861256.reviewBody: Cliff divers is fun to watch. Was here 10 years ago and worth the visit again. Upgraded to sit on patio sipping drinks. Unique to acaculpco.

465107157.name: Pleasant and entertaining show!
465107157.author: a TripAdvisor user
465107157.reviewBody: I went to the night time show. It was nice. I was concerned about not being able to see the divers, but that was short-lived. They have very bright lights that easily illuminate the entire area. The show was about half an hour, start to finish. After the show, I was able to purchase a postcard and had some of the divers sign it! All in all, it was amazing experience and I would do it again.

464575056.name: go in the daytime
464575056.author: a TripAdvisor user
464575056.reviewBody:
went for the pm show 
pay to eat in the restaurant the shade is a very welcome break from the noon
day sun
be prepared to tip the divers
the food is mediocre by acapulco standards

464268150.name: Intense show - Great Experience
464268150.author: a TripAdvisor user
464268150.reviewBody: The water was extremely rough the night we visited. I was nervous for the divers. But the show was excellent. We saw the 7:30 and 8:30pm shows. Watching them climb the cliff is also a great part of the show. An experience you don\'t want to miss. We had dinner on a patio overlooking the show at La Perla. Definitely the way to go. Food and service was excellent. A must see.

463740497.name: Well worth it!
463740497.author: a TripAdvisor user
463740497.reviewBody: Did the lunch and dive show.  Food was good, not great.  Drink included which was nice.  Only did 4 dives, was expecting a bit more, but amazing none the less.

463490893.name: Daring divers
463490893.author: a TripAdvisor user
463490893.reviewBody: The seven divers put on a special show for our cruise ship at 10.00am. I\'m glad it was early because the main viewing areas are 70 steps down and unshaded, This is the only area in the arena that you can clearly see the divers enter the water. Diving off the top is 130 feet up and some of the divers climbed barefooted from the sea to the diving platforms. Acapulco is famous for the divers and it was well worth seeing.

463315070.name: Flying Artists
463315070.author: a TripAdvisor user
463315070.reviewBody: The 1:30 show had 5 men who performed.  They were great to watch as they climbed the rock wall to the platforms.  As they hit the water, you hold your breath that they will reappear to the arousing applause of the on looking crowd.

463286096.name: Touristic hype
463286096.author: a TripAdvisor user
463286096.reviewBody: It felt like it was a bit of hype.The divers were all boys and I know it\'s not that easy as it seems ,as the cliff was steep and they climb it after getting wet in the water.But,I was not so impressed.

463044015.name: Cliff Divers - don\'t miss this!
463044015.author: a TripAdvisor user
463044015.reviewBody: Here you will see the cliff divers, a very cool experience. You can view from the (hot) outside ledge , or have lunch on the shaded patio and a front row seat to the action. Our lunch was $13 USD pp which included fish and hamburgers and a drink. The fish with vegetables and rice was delicious accompanied by a frozen margarita!

461771853.name: Iconic Acapulco Cliff Divers
461771853.author: a TripAdvisor user
461771853.reviewBody: The La Quebrada cliff divers have been an iconic Acapulco tourist attraction since 1934.  For the inexpensive price of 50 pesos, you see a spectacular show.  After their famous cliff top diving, they climb back up the impossibly steep cliff face.  Don\'t visit Acapulco without seeing these amazing divers!

461596590.name: What a great place!
461596590.author: a TripAdvisor user
461596590.reviewBody: La Quebrada, Acapulco is undoubtedly one of the best places you can visit with your family. The food was one of my favorite parts because it was always fresh and had a great flavor. The waitress of the restaurant looked after us and also greeted us when we came to the restaurant. We all agree to spend the weekend where my father was born, La Quebrada,  Acapulco. He knew most of the places where we could explore without restrictions. One of the places we went was Acapulco\u2019s  Bay. It was an unforgettable experience because I never thought it would be as beautiful as my father had told me. \nWe went swimming in the sea where the sand mercilessly touched my body creating an unfamiliar feeling. I  had never been so close to the sea in my life. I had only heard people talk about it.  The tremendous afternoon heat made me immediately jump into the water with my father, where he and the rest of my family were waiting for me. Even the hot sun was able to convince my mother who hates swimming, to take a dive in the sea.We all had a great time that we forgot about school, work, and everything else.The best thing about this trip was that my whole family had fun and enjoyed family time together, something that not everyone can do. It was all because we went to one of the most calm, fun places of all time.

461023568.name: Must see
461023568.author: a TripAdvisor user
461023568.reviewBody: Famous high divers in Acapulco climb up a cliff and then dive into a very narrow and shallow piece of water. Do not miss this show.

460241833.name: Great diving show
460241833.author: a TripAdvisor user
460241833.reviewBody: Liked watching the divers, it costs $50 pesos to watch. The first show is at 7:30 pm. The ask for tips at the end, you can tip if you want. Very nice experience.

459838215.name: Divers are great!
459838215.author: a TripAdvisor user
459838215.reviewBody: We went into a restaurant above to buy a ticket which included one drink and watched five divers from above! So fun to be there! We then took pictures with the divers and gave them tips since our guide said they only work for tips.

459726893.name: great place to visit
459726893.author: a TripAdvisor user
459726893.reviewBody: The place is a good site to visit and see the famous divers that fly in the air and go very close to the mountain rock and sinks in to the beautiful blue sea water.

458881089.name: A must see!
458881089.author: a TripAdvisor user
458881089.reviewBody: It\'s worth going and viewing from the public gallery for just a few pesos rather than pay out for an overpriced meal at the restaurant as the view is just as good and the divers make their way to and from the cliff through the crowd. Saw 2 dive shows and the fire dive for the last show of the night was the best. They are brave souls who risk their lives for public entertainment and worth tipping at the end.

458595266.name: The guys are so brave to jump
458595266.author: a TripAdvisor user
458595266.reviewBody: I saw the show at night from the hotel mirador la quebrada. Amazing view. When the divers finished their competition. They walk to the hotel to take pictures with you. Very impress

458523235.name: Part of a city tour with Sebastian Hernandez
458523235.author: a TripAdvisor user
458523235.reviewBody: We had a delicious lunch of fish Tacos at a restaurant overlooking the Cliff Diving Show.  The divers did a great job and put on quite a daring exhibition climbing up the cliff prior to diving off.

458319443.name: Always wonderful to see
458319443.author: a TripAdvisor user
458319443.reviewBody: Whatever you do, don\'t take a tour to get to this attraction.  You can take a taxi to the front door and get there about 12:45 and pay $12.50 for a great table with a view, a good lunch and a free drink.  We were there years ago and the food has gotten much better.  Great lunch.  Always exciting and the divers come up afterwards.  There\'s where to spend your extra money in tipsand photos for these brave entertainers.

458272703.name: Awesome
458272703.author: a TripAdvisor user
458272703.reviewBody: This is must see when going to Acapulco... \nbeautiful view plus amazing to see these guys climb and cliff and than dive in..

457752740.name: Must see in Acapulco
457752740.author: a TripAdvisor user
457752740.reviewBody: Don\'t miss the cliff divers. You don\'t need to go to a restaurant or pay a lot of money. Just stand on the cliff with the locals for the best view. It\'s an impressive show and only in Acapulco.

457721554.name: Brave men and a great tradition
457721554.author: a TripAdvisor user
457721554.reviewBody: At the age of 12 and after about 5 attempts (climbing up to the top and then coming back down again) I finally jumped (not dived) off the 5 metre board at our local swimming baths! These guys dive from 40 metres into water not much deeper than our local pool. Unfortunately, familiarity (nowadays) almost always breeds contempt and so because we have seen it on TV it MUST be simple. Sometimes you have to forget the hype and ignore the commercialism which has inevitably grown up around something like the cliff divers and just MARVEL at the bravery and professionalism of these guys coupled with the sheer spectacle of the location and presentation. \nIf you do not agree with me - dive from 40 metres, video yourself and send it to me... I will be really happy to edit my review AND bow down to you.....

457659823.name: It\u00b4s a MUST if you visit Acapulco
457659823.author: a TripAdvisor user
457659823.reviewBody: Going to La Quebrada is something you cannot miss. I recommend you to visit it from monday to friday, because on the weekends it\u00b4s crowded. The 22:30 is with torches, that makes a little bit more special. The divers have to climb and swim to get to the place where they jump, that itself is something worth to watch. It\u00b4s not that far, just a few blocks from the final part of the avenue Costera Miguel Aleman, that is the main avenue of Acapulco.

457373855.name: Well worth seeing
457373855.author: a TripAdvisor user
457373855.reviewBody: If you go to Acapulco, you have to see the cliff divers.  Watching the divers plunge into the shallow water far below is a heart-stopping spectacle.  Not only are the divers dare-devils, but they are excellent divers as well, executing a variety of different dives solo or in twos or threes.\n\nNot to be missed.

454999531.name: Unique Show
454999531.author: a TripAdvisor user
454999531.reviewBody: I recommend renting a boat to go see the divers show great view and comfortable having drinks and enjoying with family and friends

454936587.name: excellent show
454936587.author: a TripAdvisor user
454936587.reviewBody: We saw the show, Excellent cliff divers.very good show,very good entertainment.this experience I saw only in acapulco

454828410.name: High Diving at its best
454828410.author: a TripAdvisor user
454828410.reviewBody: My family recently saw the La Quebrada cliff divers. It is an exhilarating show with death defying flips and dives.

454323946.name: You have to do it
454323946.author: a TripAdvisor user
454323946.reviewBody: You simply have to do this, being a big part of the attraction of the city. You can see multiple old movies, including Elvis Presley watching this. In fact, if you go watch it at the restaurant in front of it, they have walls and walls of signatures of famous people, from John Wayne to Walt Disney to Frank Sinatra. It is better to see the divers from there than it is from the crowded, hot location under the sun. Food at the place is surprisingly decent, if not great.  The dives, three in a row are brief but very nice.

454142732.name: Excellent Show Mediocre Food
454142732.author: a TripAdvisor user
454142732.reviewBody: We enjoyed the thrilling show and the view from the restaurant was wonderful.   The entertainment between shows was also good and we enjoyed good service.   The food, however, left much to be desired.   The package price was very reasonable and the experience is well worth the price.  I would prefer to pay a little more and improve the quality of the food,  but do not let the mediocre food keep you away from an experience you can only enjoy in Acapulco!\n\n

454029185.name: OMG
454029185.author: a TripAdvisor user
454029185.reviewBody: It really must be seen to be believed.  Word cannot begin to describe the bravery and spectacle of the cliff divers.  Water and a hat are a must if you are unable to get into the shelter of the bar, which does actually give the best view.

453466598.name: Incredible must-see in Acapulco!
453466598.author: a TripAdvisor user
453466598.reviewBody: La Quebrada was part of our day tour with Sebastian Hernandez Ricardo in early January 2017.  The divers are tremendous athletes, jumping from as high as 140-150 feet.  The water below is shallow compared to the diving height, and each diver must calculate the incoming wave before jumping so as not to break his neck.  Several times boats who brought spectators had to back up because the surf kept carrying them into the path of the divers.  \nWe watched from la Mirador, where we also enjoyed lunch, great hospitality, and perusing the signatures of the many celebrities who have watched the cliff divers from that same space.  (History note: FUN IN ACAPULCO with Elvis Presley was filmed here.)  Our kids, 14, 12, 9, & 4, LOVED all of it!  Tremendous feats!  Yes, the cliff divers gladly accept tips (It is also customary to give tips to a winning luchador.), but they will gladly take photographs with you and chat about their work and training.    I\'m glad we didn\'t skip out on this!

453214259.name: Fascinating event.  The divers were super.  Well worth the trip and not expensive.
453214259.author: a TripAdvisor user
453214259.reviewBody: This is a must do in Acapulco.  It\'s in the old city with kits of shops and restaurants nearby.  Go all of the way down where the divers climb over the wall.  It is very inexpensive but the divers want tips.  Well worth it and very entertaining.

453074465.name: Overrated tourist attraction
453074465.author: a TripAdvisor user
453074465.reviewBody: Maybe this was an attraction 50 yr. ago. You have to pay to get in, than the divers only do 3 scheduled diving shows a day, that last 5 minutes no more and after is over you are asked to give them tip. There is nothing else to do in the close proximity, so if you don\'t make it for the scheduled dive times you are stock in neighborhood that does not have much to offer.

452456528.name: Amazing Divers!
452456528.author: a TripAdvisor user
452456528.reviewBody: The last time I visited La Quebrada was 50 years ago.  The divers are just as impressive now as they were back then!  You can\'t visit Acapulco and not go here.  There are great viewing places from top to bottom.  The waters are shallow and dangerous.  They jump from about 140 feet

451836256.name: Tourist trap
451836256.author: a TripAdvisor user
451836256.reviewBody: Kind of a tourist trap, the diving takes about 3 minutes but they make you wait for an hour. \nDisappointing

451357967.name: WOW! Great Show!-Facilities not the best
451357967.author: a TripAdvisor user
451357967.reviewBody: When I first found out that the private tour we were doing ended at the La Quebrada to see Cliff Divers I wasn\'t sure what to think. But WOW it blow me away! It was a really great show! There was numerous divers from 3 different levels into rocky water below. They first climb up the cliffs in the swim gear and bare feet then take turn praying, then either jump as a twosome or individually with numerous flips and turns! Just stunning! The facility has a lot of steep stairs over a few different levels or you can purchase drink and watch from in the bar. We got there early and headed to the lower level. Thank gosh we got there about 20mins early if not all you would be able to see is the back of other peoples heads instead of the divers entering the water.If you are quick with your camera you can get some really great shots! The day we were there it was 32C and no shade. Make sure you have water and sunscreen!

451295705.name: Amazing divers
451295705.author: a TripAdvisor user
451295705.reviewBody: We went to la perla, it has GREAT views and includes a cocktail with your entrance fee. These young men take their lives in their hands with each dive in to 12 ft of water! We went to the last show of the night. Most enjoyable and daring.... Afterwards looking at all the photos in the hotel, all the history, all the Hollywood stars who\'d been to see them... Wow even Elvis had been there....Or is that just a movie? Great night out....

451259146.name: Not to be missed
451259146.author: a TripAdvisor user
451259146.reviewBody: Evening and night show, the last one at 10.30 pm is performed by the last man with torches in his hand. Now you pay a ticket at the entrance, but is very cheap. Some chairs available on a terrace, close to ticket office, on the right. A very special, traditional attraction you don\'t want to miss

451253625.name: Night show with divers using tourches
451253625.author: a TripAdvisor user
451253625.reviewBody: It\'s amazing!! Day in-out and multiple times. Day and night showings. \n\nFun family activity. Has a symbolic fee entrance now, which before they didn\'t. It\'s okay, I thought.  Once you experience what these brave cliff divers do for a living, you\'ll probably see their side.  An additional tip$$ is kind of expected (*optional)- or try to buy from divers themselves  a t-shirt or have a photo taken with them after their dive.
